properties.description: Open from 30/01/2023. Fraser's Bar (to the left hand of the Connaught Theatre foyer) is open to all with comfy seats and free hot drinks and biscuits. Games and activities are also available. Quote 'WTMWARM30' to book your free ticket to any film starting between the hours of 2pm - 6pm on Mondays. Visit wtm.uk, go to our Box Office at the Connaught Theatre in person, or call to book: 01903 206 206. Booking available on the day or in advance.

properties.description: Buddy's is a friendly and welcoming social space, open to all, open daily from 10am to 2pm. Their warm space will operate on Tuesday's & Thursday's from 2pm to 5pm where you will be able to engage in activities, access support and advice, get a cuppa or simply use the space to charge your device. Hear more about what Worthing Mencap do on their website: https://www.worthingmencap.org/

properties.description: The folks at Goring United Reformed Church open their doors every Monday from 2pm - 4pm their warm space. They're is plenty to do with games, board games and free WIFI on offer, or perhaps just an opportunity to eat cake and have a chat with a neighbour. Find out more here: https://www.gurc.net/monday-drop-in-group

properties.description: Join the fab crew at Maybridge Community Church for their Saturday Warm Space open from 9am-4pm. The guys have squeezed about everything possible into their warm space, so that there is something for everyone! You can enjoy a FREE cafe that will be serving not only brekkie but lunch too. You will have the chance to watch movies, play board games, charge your devices, take part in craft activities, get IT support and/or signposted to services that can help. It could be as simple as spending some time talking to a neighbour or meeting new people, the guys have really got you covered! Find out more about what they are up to here: http://www.maybridge.org.uk/

properties.description: With their comfy sofas and bags of space to take the load off and warm up, it really will feel like a home away from home. The Pause Community Hub will be opening it's warm space on Monday's from 1pm-4pm and on Tuesday's & Thursday's from 10am-4pm. They have free wifi and enough plug sockets to charge a house full of handheld appliances. They will be serving FREE hot beverages, so pop along and see them. More info on the hub space can be found here: https://www.pausecommunityhub.com/

properties.description: St Botolph's Church's Place of Welcome Warm Space will run from 2nd December 2022 through to 24th February 2023 extending it's hours - from 10:30am to 2pm. All are welcome to come along, warm up, socialise & chat , play board games and grab a light refreshment to. Toys will also be available for little people too. To find out more about the Church Offer, please visit their website: https://www.achurchnearyou.com/church/2864/

properties.description: The lovely folk at St. Stephen's will be opening their doors, Monday to Friday (with the exception of Wednesday 25th January) from 9am-5pm, for the whole of January! Find out more about what they do here: https://www.achurchnearyou.com/church/4819/service-and-events/events-regular/

properties.description: Join the guys over at St Andrew's Church in Tarring at their Warm Welcome Hub, on a Tuesday from 10:30am to 1:30pm. Their warm space will be filled with board games, cards, knitting and chat. They'll be serving up soup and a roll at lunch times, as well as other refreshments ... you can even bring your dog. What's not to like! Why not check out their Facebook Page and give them a follow: https://www.facebook.com/StAndrewsChurchWestTarring/
